meanings.definition: To be engaged in work for pay.
meanings.sent1: She is employed at the store down the street.
meanings.sent2: He has been employed as a teacher for many years.
meanings.sent3: The cat employed its paws to catch the toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The sun employed its rays to warm the earth.
meanings.sent5: The chef employed various spices to enhance the flavor of the dish.

meanings.sent1: The company employed new technology to improve efficiency.
meanings.sent2: She employed a different approach to solve the problem.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel employed its tail to balance on the tree branch.
meanings.sent4: The artist employed vibrant colors to create a striking painting.
meanings.sent5: He employed his charm to win over the crowd.

meanings.sent1: The children employed themselves with building a sandcastle.
meanings.sent2: She employed her time by learning a new skill.
meanings.sent3: The dog employed its energy by running around the yard.
meanings.sent4: The wind employed the leaves in a dance across the lawn.
meanings.sent5: He employed his mind in solving the challenging puzzle.
